response.job_title: Roku Developer at Globant - Human-Centered design specialist
response.summary:
I'm a front-end, middle-end developer. Experienced worker with Roku BrightScript and MERN stack. I have advanced systems thinking, more than three years of industrial product development experience, and I'm a human-centered design specialist, qualities that strengthen my ability to meet requirements, understand users, and communicate better with the different departments and professionals within the company. A developer with a designer's eye.

I'm currently working at Globant as a Roku Developer for the NFL Roku App.

I love the product design and development, with a strong focus on user experience. I seek to solve people's needs and enhance the user experiences in the different solutions in which I get involved.

I'm an Industrial Engineer, and Product Design and Development Specialist, focused on Human-Centered Value Creation; which gives me the ability to have a holistic view of problems and situations, and to understand the requirements with a design and engineering perspective.

I've been an entrepreneur for three years, leading projects of design, development, production and marketing of sewing products such as fashion, leather goods, footwear, among others.

Related technologies:
- HTML5 / CSS3 / JS ES6+
- TypeScript / React
- Python3 / Pandas
- SQL
- Flask
- Apps Script
- BrightScript / Scenegraph
- Wordpress

Knowledgeable in:
- Human-Centered Value Creation
- Human-Centered Design and Development
- Balanced Scorecard
- Lean Management
- Finance
- Blender 3D
- Rhinoceros
- 3D Scanning
- Figma
- Illustrator
response.skills: Roku, Django, Pandas, Flask, Roku , User-centered Design, Front-end Development, Software Development, Diseño centrado en el usuario, Diseño de productos, Desarrollo de productos, Análisis financiero, Investigación de mercado, Vigilancia tecnológica, Planificación estratégica, Web Applications, Programación orientada a objetos, 3D Modeling, Business Strategy, Analytical Skills

profile_positions.description:
Currently working with NFL Roku App.

- Support and maintenance of the App.
- Front-end development of screens with lists and grids, able to populate items dynamically.
- Polling and refreshing logics for different landers and components.
- Roku Store logics related to filtering and matching data with external APIs, in the purchase and restore flows.
- Maintenance and enhancements in Analytics flows with Conviva and Adobe.
- Analysis of the current architecture and performance improvements based on data obtained using RRM, BSProf, and RASP for automation, and processed with Python, Pandas, SciPy, and MatPlotLib.
- Design and implementation of the new architecture required by the redesign of the application based on Section Lists builded with LayoutGroups, custom containers, dynamic animations, and custom lists builders with TargetList.
- Accompaniment, onboarding, and follow-up of team members.
profile_positions.title: Roku Developer, SSr Adv

profile_positions.description:
Watch TV (https://play.watch.tv.br/) and Multi+ (https://multimais.tv/) apps.

- DRM content integration with Kaltura's API for movies, series, and live streams.
- Development of an EPG for live streams, capable of switching between available channels without leaving the player.
- Improvements in login flows, and filtering of data depending on the account specifications and user profiles.
- Build Postman collections for login, check subscription, check connection, user content, and get media object flows for both applications.
- Integration of Youbora for VOD content tracking and analytics.
profile_positions.title: Roku Freelance Developer

profile_positions.description:
Worked on the Dashboard project, an intranet for call center staff in Colombia and Pakistan.

- Design and specify the requirements for the Dashboard project.
- Develop the logic and templates for views in Django required by the operations and management staff.
- Develop the architecture and implement the API endpoints for Dashboard with Python, Pandas and Flask to process and transform calls, sales, schedules and other data and information required by operations and management areas.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Designed and developed automated tools in Google Spreadsheets and Apps Script to accelerate the analysis of data related to a study of the Peruvian Beverage Market to find opportunities to encourage coffee consumption.

Analyze behaviors and provide information related to the Peruvian coffee market.

Project contracted by CPCC (Peruvian Chamber of Coffee and Cocoa).
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Established economic models of projects, and trained managerial staff in accounting and financial knowledge.

Designed and build automated Google Suite tools to facilitate the collection, storage, and processing of data using Google Spreadsheets and AppsScript.
profile_positions.title: Financial Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Business focused in design and development of sewing products. We have a cycling brand called BCmodo (you can follow us in Instagram as @bcmodo).

We have designed and developed products as clothing, cars upholstery, backpacks, cycling bags and shoes.

We use tools as 3D scanning, CAD and 3D modeling to design and develop our products.
profile_positions.title: CEO & Founder

profile_positions.description:
Entrepreneurship project founded with my family. We made and commercialized seat covers for cars, mats, floors, and upholstery.
Our focus and differential was personalized design and sophistication.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Tutorship in the field of operations research for university students at National University of Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Tutor of Operations Research

profile_positions.description: Coordinate application of test "Pruebas Saber" for 3°, 5° and 9° scholar grades in the municipalities of Cáchira (Norte de Santander), La Julia (Meta) and Mosquera (Cundinamarca).
profile_positions.title: ICFES Delegate

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
